Stanion, Northants Waltz Contest results:
1st Prize Walgrave Amateur 2nd Prize Gretton 3rd Prize Bozeat Brass
Walter Reynolds was disqualified from leading Bozeat Brass Band on the grounds that he was a professional musician.
